title: (14811) Los Villares - 34 Diseminado los Villares
description: Camping- Cortijo Los Villares. Posada Niña Margarita. Motorhome and Camper area. Spectacular enclave for recreation and activities in the mountains. The owner offers accommodation at the Posada if you do not have a Camper or similar. There is also a bar service and meals. We only have 12 plots that give you an authentic family atmosphere and with a 100% guarantee of disconnection and relaxation. The 12 plots with access to electricity and 6 plots without electricity. In La Posada, which is 100 meters away, is the reception. There is a bar and very good internet connection. In spring and summer the Garden works and it is possible to buy totally organic vegetables or share a good time with the "Innkeeper"

title: (14009) Córdoba - 1 Plaza Tejar

description: drinking fountain

title: (14009) Córdoba - 33 Calle Segunda de Miraflores

title: (14010) Córdoba - 6 Calle Escritor Sebastián Cuevas
description: ? Parking space near the center of Córdoba (1.2km from Mezquita). There are also a number of campers for overnight stay.

title: (14004) Córdoba - A-431
description:
Parking and service area with a steep incline. 20-30 minutes walk from the world famous Mesquita and 10 minutes walk from the historic center. Super central with a large, beautiful park just above (good for joggers and dog walkers). Jacks can compensate for the gradient. Balancing with wedges is much more difficult.
The first 10 minutes are free. After that, every minute is billed. Payment is by credit card.
There is no electricity on the pitches. There is an emergency power connection at the disposal station
Danger:
1) Not suitable for vehicles over 8.50 m.
2) The place is parceled out. If you use more than one plot, you pay twice! (Furniture, trailer or wrong parking). Pay attention to the boundaries of the parcel.
3) After paying, you have 5 minutes to leave. After that you have to pay !

title: (14004) Córdoba - 14 Calle Pintor Espinosa
description: Laundromat from the Speedqueen chain. Very clean and 10 minutes walk from the motorhome area (on the other side of the park). There is even a machine and a dryer reserved for animals.

title: (14010) Córdoba - 6 Calle Poeta Antonio Gala

description: Corner for picnic and night near the road. The natural corners are rare here!

title: (14004) Córdoba - 0 Calle Caballerizas Reales
description: Drinking water fountain, there are places to park just opposite, provide a jerrycan for filling.

title: (14004) Córdoba - 1 Calle Manuel de la Haba
title_short: (14004) Córdoba - 1 Calle Manuel de la Haba
description: Cemetery car park with a small entrance ideal for visiting the city and spending one of the peaceful nights there

title: (14960) Rute - 1 Calle Antonio Llamas Cruz

title: (14960) Rute - 19 Calle de los Olivos
description: Motorhomes next to the municipal sports zone center. Parking is good and quiet. Download services, but the water is now working.

title: (14004) Córdoba - 720 Calle Pintor Espinosa
description: Free public parking. We arrived at it accompanied by the local Cordoba police and they told us that there were no problems for spending the night in it. During the day it is controlled by an association for the disabled who give you a ticket for one euro and spend the day. Very quiet and without problems to just sleep and visit the beautiful city of Cordoba. MANY THANKS TO THE LOCAL POLICE OF CORDOBA FOR THEIR HELP.

title: (14859) Albendín - Unnamed Road
description: On the dam about 8 parking spaces from the Naitic Club directly on the lake. We stayed here with 2 campers. Bar with great food available. It runs the 9km off the main road to get here. Class

title: (14010) Córdoba - 7B Pasaje Cordoba
description: Flat ground parking near the skatepark. Quiet in a busy but quiet corner

title: (14004) Córdoba - 25 Avenida del Aeropuerto
description: Washing with upper walkway

title: (14004) Córdoba - s/n Plaza de Vista Alegre
title_short: (14004) Córdoba - s/n Plaza de Vista Alegre
description: Local sports centre - we asked to use the showers and they let us in for free. Showers are relatively clean, and there is hot water. You push the button every 20 seconds or so for water, but temperature and pressure are good.

title: (14859) Albendín - 26 Calle Noria
description: A new area with gray water and black water emptying point and clean water filling point very very cozy quiet town

title: (14004) Córdoba - 14 Calle Escritor Conde de Zamora
title_short: (14004) Córdoba - 14 Calle Escritor Conde de Zamora
description: Online parking area, ideal for motorhome. 16 minutes from the mosque. A quiet place with no problem being away from the center. 2 nights without problem

title: (14010) Córdoba - 4 Calle Ronda de la Manca
title_short: (14010) Córdoba - 4 Calle Ronda de la Manca
description: Click & Clean self-service laundry with home delivery. Industrial washing and drying machines. We are ironing. Washed at 30'. 20' high capacity drying with maximum efficiency. Next to the Magdalena Church, the Faculty of Law and other points of tourist interest. Great design amenities very welcoming. Open 365 days

title: (14910) Benamejí - N-331
description: Gas station with all services, also bathrooms and showers

title: () Rute - Unnamed Road
description: Fuente Alta Recreational Area. It is an area with tables and seats to spend the day outdoors. It has a source of untreated water. You can do some hiking route. There is very little space to park. It is next to some tennis courts. The access is quite narrow but we have accessed with a 7.5 meter motorhome

title: (14005) Córdoba - 18 Prolongacion Avenida de Manolete
description: Online parking next to a park and a Mercadona. We stayed 2 nights. There is a lot of noise from the bus line at 50m. Line 7 to get closer to the center or 25min walk

title: (14014) Córdoba - 400 Ctra, Madrid, Kilómetro
description: Large lot without services. There is a gas station right on the site and opposite there is a well-known department store. Floor slightly level.

title: (14014) Córdoba - 5 Calle del Periodista Pedro Alvarez
title_short: (14014) Córdoba - 5 Calle del Periodista Pedro Alvarez
description: Renovated parking area, with plenty of parking, good place to sleep. It is very close to a Carrefour, gas stations, a Dia supermarket that has laundry, etc.

title: (14005) Córdoba - Jose Maria Martorell
description: Laundry inside the shopping center, open on Saturdays and Sundays, as well as other typical services in shopping centers, including a service station with LPG and butane bottles.

title: (14005) Córdoba - Ctra. Palma Del Río km3,3
title_short: (14005) Córdoba - Ctra. Palma Del Río km3,3
description: Free parking, to spend the night if night falls, ample space

title: (14960) Rute - 45 Calle Paseo del Fresno
description: Close to the Anis Museum, whose owner said we could park for the night there after tasting the product! It is clearly used for events and there are toilets there. The town aire (N37.331450 W4.373337) is also good but beware - water is no longer available, only emptying although it is still signed as Motorhome Services.

title: (14880) Luque - CO-6204
description:
Parking actually for the excursion point
"Laguna del Salobral.
However, the lagoon has completely dried up. so it is rarely visited.
A very very quiet place.
In the midst of olive plantations.
No problems.

The place is right on the bike path
"Via Verde del Aceite"
This bike path is an open railway line. (olive oil train). In this area it runs through a very beautiful part of Andalusia. Over bridges and small gorges, almost flat.
Ideal for small bike tours.

title: (14014) Córdoba - 31 Calle Hermano Juan Fernández
description: Large capacity self-service laundry, cheap prices and good service

title: (14005) Córdoba - s/n Jose Maria Martorell
description: Repsol service station with six kilos of K6 butane cylinder

title: (14007) Córdoba -
description: Dead end street between the park and the gym. The gym offers 3 free days: you have a bathroom, changing room you can train or go to the pool if you like. During the hours of the shops there is a gorilla with yellow overalls, as in all the streets of Córdoba.

title: (14014) Córdoba - 1D Calle Escritor Almeida Garret
description: Free free parking, no schedule. Ideal for the night. Descampado in the Fatima neighborhood, a good neighborhood where you can rest peacefully, next to a school and a soccer field, and with a stream behind (just outside the city, the first area as soon as you enter from the highway of Madrid) . Very good communication with the historic center (at the corner stop buses line 1 and 2, which leave you in 15-20 minutes in the center).

description: Large parking lot for Motorhomes. Buses and cars usually park, very close to the Rute Center and Museums of Anis, Jamón... also panoramic view. From there you can exit to go to the Tower

title: (14005) Córdoba - 6 Carretera Palma del Río
description: Lavomatic at the repsol petrol station. small bread and small things store

title: (41560) Estepa - A-92

title_short: (14011) Córdoba - 131 Calle Arqueólogo García y Bellido
description: Land parking very close to the center. Stick with the bus station and train station, both of which have toilets.

title: (14910) Benamejí - Carretera Córdoba - Málaga
description: Small clearing on the shore of the Genil under the ancient bridge of the National Four. Get off just before the bridge to the left as you get off El Tejar. Beware of the current of the River.

title: (14005) Córdoba -

title: (14014) Córdoba - Calle Guarani
description: Without facilities It is fine to park and visit the city or spend a night or two at most. It is about 20 minutes from the center although there is also public transport

title: (41560) Estepa - Autovía del Olivar
description: Repsol station towards malaga on 92 LPG

title: (41569) Marinaleda - 5 Avenida Libertad
description: Plaza and open space between Calle Alcalde Vicente Cejas, Avenida de la Libertad and Calle Olivos. Quiet place in the middle of town during the week, recommended by people from the town since we asked where to sleep and they sent us there. Things to keep in mind: -In the open field right next to it there is a bar-concert hall -On Wednesdays there is a market, so if you sleep there on a Tuesday you may not be able to leave until noon. The photo is from google maps because we didn't take a photo the same day and I made the post later... they recently built some public toilets, but I don't know the hours of these toilets

title: (14006) Córdoba - 315A Pasaje Pintor Racionero Castro
description: Parking day and night. Bivouac allowed. Free.

title: (14006) Córdoba - 1 Calle Pintor Monserrat
description: Laundry service with dryer, that works just fine. The machines accept coins but there is a cash-coin exchanger.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 18P Calle Juan de Gortz
description: Quiet street to park the motorhome

title: (14011) Córdoba - 4 Calle Isla Madeira
description: Speed Queen laundromat. No dogs allowed, but there are two hooks in front of the door where you can park your four-legged friend.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 1 Calle Islas Chafarinas
description: Land parking, flat and with the noise of the highway.

title: (41560) Estepa - 2 Avenida Américas

title: (14005) - 21E Calle 6 Sg
description:
One of the few places where LPG - LPG. they have all adapters!
ATTENTION for the loading of the bottles need you the bottle base adapter I could not charge my french 13kg and my Woodruff... (70km detour for nothing)
No other service

title: (41560) Estepa - 1 Carretera Zona de Servicio
description: Parking lot near A-92. Next to gas station and restaurants.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 3E Calle Poeta Emilio Prados
description: Rammed earth car park. We only stayed during the day because around a lot of hlm. 2 km from the center.

title: (14193) Córdoba - Avenida Principal El Higuerón
description:
Parking spaces with electricity and water
Squares with water and emptying
Central squares with services


Parking for motorhomes and campers, located on a large plot in a quiet area perfect for resting, visiting Córdoba and Medina Azahara (since we are only 1.6 km from the archaeological complex) You have a bakery/cafeteria open every day, a 200m2 bus stop directly to the city center, cycle path and supermarkets open from Monday to Sunday. Reservations are not allowed and it is not necessary to notify your arrival. SEE INFORMATION UPON YOUR ARRIVAL IN THE OFFICE WINDOW.

title: (14006) Córdoba - 810 Calle Ingeniero Ruiz de Azúa
title_short: (14006) Córdoba - 810 Calle Ingeniero Ruiz de Azúa
description: Free parking ground zone. Next to a large park. quiet to spend the night. Drinking water fountain in the park.

title: (14006) Córdoba - 2 Calle Decano Bartolome Vargas Escobar
title_short: (14006) Córdoba - 2 Calle Decano Bartolome Vargas Escobar
description: Quiet area for overnight.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 1P Calle Dolores Ibárruri
description: Parking area in a park with games for children, benches, in the district which is an urbanization of calm apartments, with bars, workshops, benches. Bus stop nearby and 20 minutes from the center, or 30 minutes on foot, a street behind a Mercadona

title: (14610) Córdoba - 394B Carretera Madrid Nacional IV
description: Repsol station, with a very nice gentleman, the water is at the level of the petrol pump, however you have to put petrol to enjoy it!

title: (41560) Estepa - 1 Calle Almendra
description: Quiet parking in the exhibition center

title: (14711) Encinarejo de Córdoba - 41P Calle Alcalde Antonio Guerra
title_short: (14711) Encinarejo de Córdoba - 41P Calle Alcalde Antonio Guerra
description: Parking without services, place to rest en route, visit the small and quiet town where you can eat typical food. It has recently been roofed, if you don't have room inside, you can spend the night in the surroundings, very quiet and pretty, a typical Andalusian town with streets with white houses.

title: (14005) Córdoba - 23A Calle Francisco Gracia Trenas
description: A quiet, secure and calm place to stay the night, close to El Corte Inglés shopping. Residential area where it’s possible to jogging or ride a bike, also green parks nearby.

title: (14005) Córdoba - 84a Carretera Palma del Río
description: Good petrol station next to the road, not immediately visible. Exit 50m before the construction industry. The spout has been sawn off. hose not possible

title: (41560) Lora de Estepa - Camino Cementerio
description: Large quiet parking lot for the night, no caravan service, there is a restaurant.

title: (14711) Córdoba - 25 Calle Camino del Soto
description:
Flat land next to the village.
a convenience store in the village.
very quiet in the evening a bit transient in the morning when people go to work. 2 stork nests in the village

title: (41560) Estepa - 4 Calle Médico Antonio Vilches
description: Laundromat very easy to access from exit 106 of the A-92, place to park while you wash with cafeteria, pharmacy and butcher. Better to come in the afternoon, in the morning the area is very busy. If you have any questions, the owner answers the phone right away. Establishment highly recommended if you have to do the laundry

title: (41560) Estepa - 105 Avenida de Andalucía
description: Parking near the center

title: (14005) Córdoba - CO-3314
description: The Medina azahara car park, from where the buses leave to go to the site. Ample parking. Essential visit and watch the video in the visitor center.

title: (14960) Córdoba - 71 Calle Dean Francisco Xavier
description: Public parking of | Great expanse and sand. Very quiet area with bus stop very close to reach the center. Weekends somewhat busier but affordable also [e.

name: Camping La Isla
title: (14960) Camping La Isla
description: 3rd category campsite. a lot of unevenness in most of the squares. access to electricity in the square, water must be fetched from a source to fill the CV and auto CV. The sewage must be taken to be emptied in a toilet behind the bar. Greywater to the ground directly. there are no barbecues. many dogs of the owners and of the campers loose, without a muzzle. electricity is shared and breaks frequently. PRICE in April 2023 we paid for 2 days 2 adults and 2 children in a caravan 76 euros.

title: (14913) Zurreón -
description: Nice place for an undisturbed longer stay. Good access to the river. Every now and then a few bathers come from the village, all very nice! Great for dogs.

title: (41560) Estepa - 7 Calle San Francisco
description: Fountain with fresh water

title: (41560) Estepa - 2 Plaza del Matadero

title: (41560) Estepa - 85 Carretera del Cerro
description: Place where there is a source with drinking water

title: (41400) Écija - 1 Calle Pueblo Saharaui
description: Dead end street, quiet and 10 minutes from downtown. One night without problem. Plain and asphalted. Lidl closed

title: (14960) Rute - 77 Poblado del Pantano
description: Old bus parking area for the hermitage, very quiet and surrounded by nature. Very discreet.

title: (41400) Écija - 18A Ronda de las Huertas
description: Parking without service. Perfect for the night. Place residents of the parking area during the night and staff of the Institute and the College during the day. It will never fill up, it is very large. Place crossed at the first and last hour of the day by people who go on foot and by bike

title: (14960) Rute - 90 Poblado del Pantano
description: Great view...nothing going on during the week...1.4km running route, swimming in the lake and 5km bike ride to the supermarket...

description: Pump for drinking water with good pressure Greengrocer just opposite. Park in front of it up to 7m or in the parking lot nearby.
